front.title: Internet Protocol Version 6 (IPv6) Profile for Mobile Devices

abstract.t: This document specifies an IPv6 profile for mobile devices. It lists the set of features a mobile device is to be compliant with to connect to an IPv6-only or dual-stack mobile network. This document defines a different profile than the one for general connection to IPv6 mobile networks defined in [RFC3316]. In particular, this document identifies also features to ensure IPv4 service continuity over an IPv6-only transport. Both Hosts and devices with LAN capabilities are in scope.
